|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2330](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2330 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A wyvern is one of two dragon-like monsters to use the D glyph in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the other being the [hydra](/wiki/Hydra "Hydra"). It possesses a [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") sting, but no breath weapon.

## Strategy

Wyverns are an exception to the general rule that SLASH'EM's new monsters tend to be more dangerous than their vanilla counterparts. As compared to normal dragons, this is a relatively weak monster. The poison component of its attack is rendered mostly harmless by [MC 3](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation"), and completely so by [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"). By the time one encounters wyverns, one should almost certainly have at least one, if not both, of these properties. Since they have no breath attack, they are thus less of a threat than normal dragons.

## Mythology

A wyvern is a dragon-like creature from English mythology that possesses only two legs (sometimes none) and a barbed tail, unlike most depictions of dragons.

## See also

- [Hydra](/wiki/Hydra "Hydra")
- [Dragon](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")

Wyvern

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
D wyvern
Difficulty 24
Attacks Sting 4d6 poison, Bite 3d8
D wyvern
Difficulty 24
Attacks

Sting 4d6 poison, Bite 3d8

Base level 18
Base experience 688
Speed 9
Base AC -4
Base MR 20
Alignment 7 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 4500
Nutritional value 500
Size Gigantic
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison (100%)

A wyvern:

  • can fly.
  • has no hands.
  • has a thick hide.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • hits creatures as a +2 weapon.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2330

A wyvern is one of two dragon-like monsters to use the D glyph in SLASH'EM, the other being the hydra. It possesses a poisonous sting, but no breath weapon.

Strategy

Wyverns are an exception to the general rule that SLASH'EM's new monsters tend to be more dangerous than their vanilla counterparts. As compared to normal dragons, this is a relatively weak monster. The poison component of its attack is rendered mostly harmless by MC 3, and completely so by poison resistance. By the time one encounters wyverns, one should almost certainly have at least one, if not both, of these properties. Since they have no breath attack, they are thus less of a threat than normal dragons.

Mythology

A wyvern is a dragon-like creature from English mythology that possesses only two legs (sometimes none) and a barbed tail, unlike most depictions of dragons.

See also

  • Hydra
  • Dragon
